content: this pattern of a small decorative star is called petite star which means little star use the star as a hanging decoration or crochet several to make a whole garland with stars visit my blog for more inspirations and patterns mijocrochet se 2019 version https //mijocrochet se/2019/12/01/petite-star/ 2025 version https //mijocrochet se/2025/12/05/petite-star/
